testcase.name: Change items status
testcase.system-out: Given The user open the login page..........................................passed When The user enter a valid username "s.mahallel99@gmail.com"...............passed And The user enter a valid password "123456789a"............................passed And The user check the remeber me check box.................................passed Then The system should redirect to the dashboard page with the title "ACME System 1 - Dashboard".passed Given The user open the Work Items..........................................passed And The user choose item "87996027"........................................passed When Click symbol search....................................................passed Then Work Item details appear with the header "Work Items - Work Item Details".passed When User click on button Update Work Item..................................passed Then A new windows pop Up with the header "ACME System 1"...................passed Given The User change the status of the item to "Completed" and add comment and click on Update Work Item.passed Then Then an alert with following appears "Work Item was updated accordingly".passed Given The user navigate back to work item table and check the status of random selected item.passed Then The item status is changed to "Completed"..............................passed Given The user click on reset data..........................................passed Then "Account - Reset Test Data" appear.....................................passed When The user click on Reset Test Data......................................passed Then Progress bar appear....................................................passed And Alert with the following appear "Your Test Data has been successfully reset.".passed When The user click OK......................................................passed Then The alert disappear and the progress bar...............................passed And The data in Work item table is reseted..................................passed
